title: Galbot brings in $300M to scale mobile manipulator deployments
description:
Galbot's flagship robot is the G1, a mobile manipulator with a human-like torso, two arms, and a mobile base.

The post Galbot brings in $300M to scale mobile manipulator deployments appeared first on The Robot Report.
